ComicInfo.Title: The Pyjama Girl; Jack Takes It Easy; Jack Gets Even; The Video Generation; Little Italy; The Author Discovers Artefacts of Lost Civilisation In A Dream; Some Advice For Fathers To Be; This Happened Last Night; How To Suffer Properly; The Author Is Coerced Into Doing 'Real' Work Like They Did In Olden Times; This Happened Yesterday; Bargaining With Medical Science; Yarn Heard In An Australian Pub; Ah Those Old E.C. Horror Comics; Ornithology; I Had A Ringside Seat; The Pyjama Girl's Big Night Out; My Little Girl; 1600 Miles By Coach; Captain Oblivion's Christmas Vist
ComicInfo.Summary:
An unsolved Australian murder from the 1930s.
One panel reminiscences.
Jack adjusts the TV due to poor reception.
Jack is left in a police cell, but gets even.
The spontaneity or otherwise of video.
The problems of faith and Italian customs in Australia.
A dream recollection.
Salient advice for fathers to be.
A fearful awakening from a bad dream.
A great loser
Eddie has to mow the lawn and chances across some frogs.
Eddie has a demonstration of how males contract unrinary infections.
The compulsion of the alcoholic
Unpredictable toreadors in Australia
The gruesome contents of a Canberra ornamental lake
Assorted Australian birds.
A recital upon the Kelly Memorial Theatre's opening.
More facts about an old Australian murder
How to empty the contents of the potty into the toilet.
Travelogue
The exchange of Christmas presents
